answer: Terdapat tiga jenis program internasional yang tersedia untuk mahasiswa ITS, yaitu Pertukaran (Exchange), Magang (Internship), dan Program Singkat (Short Program). Program pertukaran memungkinkan mahasiswa untuk belajar di universitas mitra ITS dengan durasi yang bervariasi tergantung pada setiap universitas, sementara program magang memberikan kesempatan bagi mahasiswa untuk magang di universitas mitra ITS dan non-mitra dengan durasi antara 1-3 bulan yang direkomendasikan untuk mahasiswa tahun terakhir. Sedangkan program singkat memungkinkan mahasiswa untuk belajar di luar negeri dengan durasi 2 minggu hingga 1 bulan, baik program yang didanai sepenuhnya maupun swadana.

answer: ITS students should prepare various things before participating in a study abroad program. Some of the preparations include documentation, financial planning, packing belongings, acquiring necessary knowledge, and ensuring psychological readiness. Additionally, students may need to fill out a Learning Agreement or Statement Letter, select courses to be transferred, check credit transfer requirements, submit all required documents to the ITS Global Engagement (ITS GE) email, and wait for further instructions. General important documents to prepare include a passport, certificate of English proficiency, official academic transcript in English, certificate of enrollment, recommendation letter in English, and funding request assistance (optional). Students can find available international programs to join through the ITS GE website or social media platforms such as Instagram, Line, and Facebook.
